channel.title: 40k usernames and passwords leaked from ProjectRS06 in plaintext
channel.description:
The link was going around in skype and on many forums, Taharok and I both felt that it warrants a topic here just to be safe. 40k projectrs06 accounts were leaked, every username and password of every account is there. Whatever hash/salt that was in place was cracked and they're swarming around the internet currently along with the source.
Play it safe
[b]CHANGE YOUR PASSWORDS IF YOU WERE INVOLVED[/b]
I have seen the list, I will not post it here. Quite a few people on these forums are on there.
The accounts of (assuming) Sinisoul, Albi, KO9, and the mods were removed and are being sold separately. This is how the source was obtained just in case you're questioning the validity of the list.
Here is the list with the passwords omitted thanks to Niall: http://ge.tt/9PcZaHY/v/0
